text: Taj Jami Gibson (born June 24, 1985) is an American professional basketball player who is a player for the Chicago Bulls since 2009. He began his career in 2006 when he played for the USC. Gibson was born on June 24, 1985 in Brooklyn, New York. He studied at Telecommunications High School, at Calvary Christian High School, and at the University of Southern California. ==References== ==Other websites== *NBA.com profile *USC Bio Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Charlotte Hornets players Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Minnesota Timberwolves players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Washington Wizards players
title: Taj Gibson
